channel.title: Small Help Need!
channel.description:
i need when a new player join my game sendmessage to him but if he log out and back again that message disappear how i make that ?
for example
now in my server say
welcome to #### there are $ players onlline
i need when new player join say some thing
example
welcome to #### there are $ players onlline talk to ^^^^ who is in the castel to get help
any help please ?

item.title: Small Help Need!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Well, you could add a boolean value to the Player class, something like “public boolean isExisting;”. If a new player is loading, make this value false. If an existing player is loading, make this value true. Then, in the login method (sendLogin() or something like that), check the value of “isExisting”. If the value is false, send that extra bit of text, but if it’s true, just send the regular login text.

Read full topic
